example: India has many languages, but English is the common language.
Most of the wheat and rice in India grows on the plains in the north.
Wheat grows near the upper part of the Ganges River.
Rice grows in the lower part of the Ganges River.
Population in South Asia is growing very rapidly.
Farmers used more fertilizer and pesticide to grow more crops.
To Hindus, the cow is a sacred animal.
There were many cotton plantations and wages were low.
The Indian government trained many computer programmers.
Overseas companies hire people in Indian call centers.
